abstract: Tour of Kenzo's newly redesigned store in Milan, which reflects revitalized vision of fashion brand's creative team, Humberto Leon and Carol Lim.
lead_paragraph: The redesigned Kenzo store in the heart of a Milan reflects the vision of Humberto Leon and Carol Lim, the creative team freshening up the label.

headline.main: Kenzo’s Milan Store: Under New Management

snippet: The redesigned Kenzo store in the heart of a Milan reflects the vision of Humberto Leon and Carol Lim, the creative team freshening up the label.
